Name: [D1] - retail_data.csv
Description: original CSV from Kaggle with retail data (primary source)

Name: [D10] - API Flask remote (ngrok)
Description: Remote Flask API exposed via ngrok tunnel, providing aggregated product data to Azure Data Factory

Name: [D11] - retail_project_db_AzureSQL
Description: Final consolidated database in Azure SQL containing all retail data

Name: [D2] - customers_local
Description: Customers table imported into SSMS (from retail_data.csv -> JSON -> import)

Name: [D3] - products_local
Description: Products table imported into SSMS (via API Flask -> import)

Name: [D4] - sales_local
Description: Facts table 'sales' imported at SSMS from retail_data.csv

Name: [D5] - retail_summary_local
Description: Final consolidated retail summary table (sales + customers + products) in SSMS

Name: [D6] - agg_sales.csv
Description: CSV with sales aggregated data exported from SSMS (to Azure Blob Storage container)

Name: [D7] - agg_customers.csv
Description: CSV with aggregated customers data exported from SSMS to Azure Blob Storage container

Name: [D8] - API Flask local
Description: API Flask local exposes aggregated products data from SSMS

Name: [D9] - almac101_container
Description: Azure Blob Storage container that stores the aggregated CSV files (agg_sales.csv and agg_customers.csv)

Name: [P1a]_import_sales_to_SSMS
Description: Import 'sales' part/data from retail_data.csv to the table sales_local at SSMS

Name: [P1b] - export_customers_json
Description: Extract customers from retail_data.csv to JSON and load into customers_local (SSMS)

Name: [P1c] - load_products_via_API
Description: Expose products via API Flask, consume and insert into products_local (SSMS)

Name: [P1d] - consolidate_sales_customers_products
Description: Join sales_local, customers_local, and products_local into retail_summary_local (SSMS consolidation step)

Name: [P2] - export_sales_agg_to_csv
Description: Export process over sales aggregation from SSMS DB (D5) to csv file at Blob Storage (D6)

Name: [P3] - export_customers_agg_to_csv
Description: Export Process over customers aggregation from SSMS DB (D5) (to CSV file at Blob Storage (D7))

Name: [P4] - export_products_agg_to_api
Description: Process to publish products aggregated data from SSMS DB (D5) (to API Flask local (D8))

Name: [P5] - publish_through_ngrok
Description: Process that exposes the local Flask API (D8) through an ngrok tunnel, creating the remote endpoint (D10)

Name: [P6] - ADF_pipeline_csv_to_SQL
Description: ADF pipeline to load aggregated CSV files into Azure SQL

Name: [P7] - ADF_pipeline_API_to_SQL
Description: ADF pipeline to load aggregated data from remote Flask API into Azure SQL
